entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
